thread.section_title: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand | acerentalcars.co.nz
thread.title: Bill
thread.title_full: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand reviewed by Bill

author: Bill
title: Bill
text:
I rented two cars,one for the North island and one for the South Island.
At both pick up places( Auckland and Picton) the staff were very helpful and friendly.The first car,a Yaris and the second,a Bluebird, were clean,
easy to drive and gave us no problems.The shuttle services Ace gave us were very useful,the first in Wellington taking us to our hotel from the drop off point, and the second at Christchurch taking us to the Airport. Also the returns procedure was quick and easy.
